high_profit.name: Dragon Fruit
high_profit.why: High market demand, long shelf life, grows well in Bihar's climate

high_profit.name: Avocado
high_profit.why: Premium fruit with growing urban demand; best for large farmers

high_profit.name: Gladiolus
high_profit.why: Grows well in winter, used in events and rituals, high-margin crop

fast_yield.name: Coriander
fast_yield.why: Grows in 30–40 days, great for short-term returns

fast_yield.name: Methi (Fenugreek)
fast_yield.why: Low investment, fast growing winter crop

low_water.name: Mustard
low_water.why: Low water requirement, supported by government MSP

low_water.name: Pearl Millet (Bajra)
low_water.why: Excellent for dry soil and rainfed farming

low_water.name: Castor
low_water.why: Hardy crop, survives in semi-arid regions

easy_maintenance.name: Potato
easy_maintenance.why: Bihar staple, good shelf life, mechanized options available

easy_maintenance.name: Arhar (Pigeon Pea)
easy_maintenance.why: Low input, nitrogen-fixing crop, fits well in Bihar agrozone

govt_supported.name: Wheat
govt_supported.why: MSP supported, safe choice, high acceptance

govt_supported.name: Paddy (Dhaan)
govt_supported.why: Traditional crop, widely grown, government backed MSP

govt_supported.name: Maize
govt_supported.why: Less water, stable price, used in multiple industries
